actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.

official_title: Joint resolution relating to the National Advisory Council on Indian Education.

summary.text: Requires the members of the National Advisory Council on Indian Education created by the Education Amendments of 1972 to be appointed not later than ten days after the enactment of this joint resolution.

titles.title: Joint resolution relating to the National Advisory Council on Indian Education.
